data.author: CarlosPC

changelog.release_notes:
1.2: Expansion update!
- Input negative numbers by long-pressing the up button!
- Long press the select button to select last operation!
- Squares and Roots are now supported! (Root support is via Babylon approximation method: is quite precise, but not perfect)

1.1: Major update!
- Support colors!
- Added floating point up to 3 decimals!
- New icon!

data.title: Calculabble
